hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #the Sun's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.
hinted_locations: Hideout 2 Torch Jail In Cell Pot 4

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that ReDead and Gibdo have their own version of Sun's Song that freezes you?

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Song of Storms#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Frozen Eye Switch Room Pot 2

SFM (Saria).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Market## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Ocarina C right Button#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Center Room Right Pot 1

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.
